title: ME60021: Advanced Mechanics Of Solids - Quick Facts
text:
ME60021
Course name | Advanced Mechanics Of Solids
Offered by | Mechanical Engineering
Credits | 4
L-T-P | 3-1-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Autumn

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Shear centre and unsymmetrical bending. Beam columns; Beams on elastic foundations; curved beams, Rotating discs and thick cylinders, virtual work; Minimum Potential energy; Hamiltons Principle. Plate Theory: Formulation by Hamiltons principle : Bending and buckling of homogeneous and Sandwich Plates. Shell theory: Introduction to theory of surface; Formulation by Hamiltons Principle; membrane, bending and buckling analysis of shells of revolution.
